sentences.literal: Zhao clan's forebears, together with Qin shared ancestor.
sentences.idiomatic: The forebears of the Zhao clan shared a common ancestor with Qin.

sentences.literal: Reached Zhong Yan, was Emperor Da Wu's charioteer.
sentences.idiomatic: The line reached Zhong Yan, who served as Emperor Da Wu's charioteer.

sentences.chinese: 其後世蜚廉有子二人，而命其一子曰惡來，事紂，為周所殺，其後為秦。
sentences.literal: His later generations Feilian had sons two, and named his one son said Elai, served Zhou, was by Zhou killed, his descendants became Qin.
sentences.idiomatic: In later generations, Feilian had two sons. He named one son Elai, who served King Zhou but was killed by the Zhou. His descendants became the Qin clan.

sentences.chinese: 惡來弟曰季勝，其後為趙。
sentences.literal: Elai's younger brother named Jisheng, his descendants became Zhao.
sentences.idiomatic: Elai's younger brother was named Jisheng. His descendants became the Zhao clan.

sentences.chinese: 孟增幸於周成王，是為宅皋狼。
sentences.literal: Mengzeng favored by Zhou Cheng Wang, this was Zhaigaolang.
sentences.idiomatic: Mengzeng found favor with King Cheng of Zhou and became known as Zhaigaolang.

sentences.chinese: 皋狼生衡父，衡父生造父。
sentences.literal: Gaolang begat Hengfu, Hengfu begat Zaofu.
sentences.idiomatic: Gaolang begat Hengfu, who begat Zaofu.

sentences.literal: Zaofu favored by Zhou Mu Wang.
sentences.idiomatic: Zaofu found favor with King Mu of Zhou.

sentences.chinese: 造父取驥之乘匹，與桃林盜驪、驊騮、綠耳，獻之繆王。
sentences.literal: Zaofu took Ji's chariot team, together with Taolin's stolen Lilu, Hualiu, Lver, presented them to Mu Wang.
sentences.idiomatic: Zaofu acquired Ji's chariot team, along with the stolen horses Lilu, Hualiu, and Lver from Taolin, and presented them all to King Mu.

sentences.chinese: 繆王使造父御，西巡狩，見西王母，樂之忘歸。
sentences.literal: Mu Wang made Zaofu drive, west toured, saw Xi Wang Mu, enjoyed it forgot return.
sentences.idiomatic: King Mu had Zaofu drive his chariot on a western tour. They met the Queen Mother of the West, and he enjoyed it so much he forgot to return.

sentences.chinese: 而徐偃王反，繆王日馳千里馬，攻徐偃王，大破之。
sentences.literal: While Xu Yan Wang rebelled, Mu Wang daily galloped thousand li horses, attacked Xu Yan Wang, greatly defeated him.
sentences.idiomatic: Meanwhile, King Yan of Xu rebelled. King Mu rode his thousand-li horses each day to attack King Yan of Xu and decisively defeated him.

sentences.chinese: 乃賜造父以趙城，由此為趙氏。
sentences.literal: Then granted Zaofu Zhao city, from this became Zhao clan.
sentences.idiomatic: He then granted Zaofu the city of Zhao. From this time onward, they became the Zhao clan.

sentences.chinese: 自造父已下六世至奄父，曰公仲，周宣王時伐戎，為御。
sentences.literal: From Zaofu below six generations to Yanfu, called Gongzhong, Zhou Xuan Wang time attacked Rong, was charioteer.
sentences.idiomatic: Six generations after Zaofu came Yanfu, also known as Gongzhong. During King Xuan of Zhou's reign, he campaigned against the Rong and served as charioteer.
